saudiFalconCup.title: Saudi Falcon Cup
saudiFalconCup.description: A unique heritage event uniting falcon enthusiasts in sporting and cultural competitions that reflect Saudi authenticity and national pride.

generalAviationAirshow.title: General Aviation Airshow 2025 Sand & Fun
generalAviationAirshow.description: Sand & Fun 2025, Saudi's first general aviation event, brings together air shows, innovation, and culture in a fun-filled experience for the whole family.

blackHatMEA.title: Black Hat MEA
blackHatMEA.description: Black Hat MEA gathers cybersecurity experts and tech innovators to confront threats and advance digital knowledge.

worldRallyChampionship.title: World Rally Championship
worldRallyChampionship.description: The World Rally Championship returns to Jeddah, showcasing elite drivers, thrilling stages, and high-speed excitement along Saudi's stunning landscapes.

f1h2o.title: F1H2O
f1h2o.description: Feel the adrenaline at F1H2O Jeddah, where world-class drivers race high-speed boats in thrilling water battles along the Red Sea.

winterWonderland.title: Winter Wonderland
winterWonderland.description: Experience a magical winter escape with thrilling rides, games, shows, and festive fun for all ages.

annabelsFineDining.title: Fine Dining: Annabel's
annabelsFineDining.description: A refined dining experience under the palms, blending Mayfair elegance with local charm, featuring signature dishes and live music vibes.

hegraDroneShow.title: Hegra Drone Show - Stories from the Sky
hegraDroneShow.description: Experience a breathtaking fusion of light, sound, and storytelling as hundreds of drones light up the night sky.

ancientKingdomsFestival.title: Ancient Kingdoms Festival
ancientKingdomsFestival.description: Become a Time Traveller and step into a world where history comes alive, from the epic rise of Dadan and Lihyan to the enduring marvels of the Nabataeans.
